languages.text: Крошечная колония похоронена в огромном провале. Оставшаяся от мирных построек кромка едва заметна даже с шаттла.
The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.
languages.original_text: Крошечная колония похоронена в огромном провале. Оставшаяся от мирных построек кромка едва заметна даже с шаттла.

traits.locale_text: The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, edged by a strip of former civilian buildings that is barely visible even from the shuttle.
The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, edged by a strip of former civilian buildings that is barely visible even from the shuttle.
The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.
The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.
The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.
The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.

languages.text: Die winzige Kolonie ist in einem gigantischen, klaffenden Krater vergraben. Die Ränder der zivilen Gebäude sind vom Shuttle aus kaum sichtbar.
languages.original_text: The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Die winzige Kolonie ist in einem gigantischen, klaffenden Krater vergraben. Die Ränder der zivilen Gebäude sind vom Shuttle aus kaum sichtbar.

languages.text: La petite colonie est enfouie dans un gouffre si gigantesque que les contours de ses structures civiles sont à peine visibles, même depuis la navette.
languages.original_text: The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: La petite colonie est enfouie dans un gouffre si gigantesque que les contours de ses structures civiles sont à peine visibles, même depuis la navette.

languages.text: その小さなコロニーは、巨大でぽっかりと口を開けた穴の中に埋まっており、民間施設の建物の縁ですら、シャトルからかろうじて見える程度だ。
languages.original_text: The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: その小さなコロニーは、巨大でぽっかりと口を開けた穴の中に埋まっており、民間施設の建物の縁ですら、シャトルからかろうじて見える程度だ。

languages.text: Esta diminuta colonia está sepultada en un inmenso foso. Cuesta ver las estructuras civiles, incluso desde la lanzadera.
languages.original_text: The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Esta diminuta colonia está sepultada en un inmenso foso. Cuesta ver las estructuras civiles, incluso desde la lanzadera.

languages.text: 这个小小的殖民地被掩埋在巨口般的深坑里。即便穿梭机即将抵达行星表面，也几乎完全看不清民用建筑的轮廓。
languages.original_text: The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: 这个小小的殖民地被掩埋在巨口般的深坑里。即便穿梭机即将抵达行星表面，也几乎完全看不清民用建筑的轮廓。

languages.text: Küçük koloni, devasa bir çukurun içine gömülü vaziyette. Sivil yapıların tepeleri, mekikten bile zar zor görülebiliyor.
languages.original_text: The tiny colony is buried in an enormous yawning pit, the edges of its civilian structures barely visible even from the shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Küçük koloni, devasa bir çukurun içine gömülü vaziyette. Sivil yapıların tepeleri mekikten bile zar zor görülebiliyor.
